General.Name: ADX Energy Ltd
General.Description: ADX Energy Ltd engages in the exploration, appraisal, and production of oil and gas properties. Its project portfolio comprises the Gaiselberg and Zistersdorf fields in the Vienna basin, Austria; d363C.R-.AX license offshore project in the Strait of Sicily, Italy; and the Parta exploration and Iecea Mare production licenses in Western Romania. The company was formerly known as AuDAX Resources Ltd. ADX Energy Ltd was incorporated in 1983 and is headquartered in Claremont, Australia.
